text: @WhiteHouse Mr. "I take no responsibility", now to cease funding to the W.H.O. because he refuses to accept the blame for #COVID19 which he knew about and didn't take action until forced to 70 days later! Reminder, 45's schedule during January and February included campaign rallies and golf!
